text: Ara strilokadera madhyera sadhaba yara, tabe tomadera dana hata yadera dhare rekheche tadera byatita, tomadera prati allahâ€Œra bidhana. Ara edera ba'ire tomadera jan'ya baidha kara gela yadi tomara ca'o tomadera dhanadaulata diye bibaha -bandhanera madhyama, byabhicarera jan'ya naya. Ata'eba tadera madhyera yadera theke tomara suphala pete ca'o tadera nirdharita maharana tadera pradana karo. Ara tomadera jan'ya dusaniya habe na nirdharita habara pare tomara yate paraspara sam'mata ha'o. Nihsandeha allah sarbajnata, paramajnani.
